SVM Freerange¶

class learners.svm_freerange.SVMFreeRange(params=None, training_instances=None)[source]¶

Bases: learners.learner.RobustLearner

Solves asymmetric dual problem: \(argmin (1/2)*⎜⎜w⎟⎟^2 + C*∑(xi0)\)

By solving the convex optimization, optimal weight and bias matrices are computed to be used in the linear classification of the instances changed by the adversary.

Parameters:
  • c_f (float) – aggressiveness assumption c_f ∈ [0.0,1.0]
  • Note – 0.0 means no attack and 1.0 is most aggressive. Default:0.5
  • xmin (float) – smallest value that a feature can take. Default:0.0
  • xmax (float) – largest value that a feature can take. Default:1.0
decision_function()[source]¶

Optimize the asymmetric dual problem and return optimal w and b.

SVM Restrained¶

class learners.svm_restrained.SVMRestrained(params=None, training_instances=None)[source]¶

Bases: learners.learner.RobustLearner

Solves asymmetric dual problem: \(argmin (1/2)*⎜⎜w⎟⎟^2 + C*∑(xi0)\)

By solving the convex optimization, optimal weight and bias matrices are computed to be used in the linear classification of the instances changed by the adversary.

Parameters:c_delta – aggressiveness assumption c_delta ∈ [0.0,1.0]. Default:0.5
